title: ExtendedHeader
description: Contains additional elements that provide more information. These elements can be labels, status, rating controls, tags, text.

ItemSeparator.description: To visually separate the items by adding a separator dot between the items. The `ItemSeparator` is only working for Label item type.

enum.description: To display label(s) as extended header.
To display rating(s) as extended header. Only the first rating item would be displayed, others would be ignored.
To display tag(s) as extended header.

ItemType.description: `ItemType` is to define the type for `Items` defined in `ExtendedHeader`. For now, only same item type is supported for all items under the `ExtendedHeader`.

Items.description: Contains items to be displayed in a row of `ExtendedHeader`. These items can be labels, status, rating controls, tags, text.

anyOf.description: Array of extended header item. In Android, if there are more than one [RatingItem](RatingItem.schema.md) defined in the array, only the first rating will be displayed.
Expects return of `ExtendedHeaderItem` in array format.
